amendment.description: To remove an unnecessary earmark for the International Peace Garden in Dunseith, North Dakota.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2812 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 63 - 32. Record Vote Number: 335.

Amendment SA 2812 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S11382-11383, S11393, S11398-11399; text: CR S11383) To remove an unnecessary earmark for the International Peace Garden in Dunseith, North Dakota.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2812 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 63 - 32. Record Vote Number: 335.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2812 proposed by Senator Coburn.
